item.name: Clarity
item.use: Restores mana over time. If the user is attacked the effect is lost

item.name: Tangos
item.use: Eat Tree - Consume a tree to restore HP over time. Comes with 3 charges.

item.name: Healing Salve
item.use: Regenerate - Restores HP over time. If the user is attacked, the effect is lost.

item.name: Smoke of Deceit
item.use: Upon activation, the user and all nearby allied player-controlled units gain invisiblity and bonus movement speed for a brief time. Minimap icons will also be hidden. Upon moving within 1025 range of an enemy hero or tower, the invisibility is lost.

item.name: Town Portal Scroll
item.use: Teleport - Teleports you to a target friendly building.

item.name: Dust of Appearance
item.use: Reveal - Reveals and slows invisible Heroes in a nearby area.

item.name: Courier
item.use: Creature that carries items to and from your base.

item.name: Flying Couier
item.use: Fast flying creature that carries items to and from your base. Requires Animal Courier.

item.name: Observer Ward
item.use: Places an Observer Ward to give sight of the surrounding area.

item.name: Sentry Ward
item.use: Places a Sentry Ward to give True Sight of the surrounding area.

item.name: Bottle
item.use: Regenerate - Restores HP and Mana over time. Effect is lost if unit is attacked. Empty Bottle refills near town fountain. You can also store runes in the bottle, to save for later use. After 2 minutes, stored Runes will be activated. If Bottle is empty, it causes a courier to move 30% slower.
